Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I made a game called Absquatulate! It's currently unlisted and I'm looking for feedback/suggestions before I make it fully public. Please read the description and play it if you're interested! Tell me about any bugs, likes/dislikes, etc.! Thanks :)
Link: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/whc8j3-j_0gs00jyj5rdwa/absquatulate
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I made a game called Absquatulate! It's currently unlisted and I'm looking for feedback/suggestions before I make it fully public. Please read the description and play it if you're interested! Tell me about any bugs, likes/dislikes, etc.! Thanks :)
Link: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/whc8j3-j_0gs00jyj5rdwa/absquatulate
